title: [KNOWN ISSUE] Store session expired and clubs not working ft. 1 IP
body:
I'm not sure if this has anything to do with the earlier login issues, but right now I'm unable to view the store page, my club tag is not showing up in game lobbies, nor can I access my club from my profile or chat tab, and my IP amount is now listed as 1.

I've tried all the potential solutions on the troubleshooting page [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq8), but nothing seemed to do the trick.

I will say that I can still log into the client, and that the correct IP value is displayed monetarily, but drops to 1 after a second or so. My RP is displayed correctly, and I can still view both my rune pages and loot tab, but trying to access the store just gets me a session expired notification, no matter where I try to access it from. I've even tried viewing the store through my browser and through a 4G connection at the store page's URL [here](https://store.oc1.lol.riotgames.com/) but I just get the same result.

Has anyone else run into the same issue? If you have and have since resolved the issue, what worked for you?

replies.body: im having the same issue, been reinstalling and updating my IE . guess it's not only my issue now.
Riot is aware, it's being worked on.
Seems like its down. I have the exact same issues, very annoying. 29K IP = 1 IP apparently.
Riot is aware, it's being worked on.
Same issue. Lodged a ticket before visiting the board. Rito must be aware by now.
Riot is aware yes, it'll be fixed ASAP.
This is a known issue and is being worked on, submitting a ticket should not be necessary.
